name: Alienation (itch)
description:
Made this game with my fiancée as a proof of concept, and now I'm releasing it along with its source code, for learning purposes.

Gameplay Instructions

Click anywhere to start the game and shoot. Don't let aliens and asteroids hit your world.

Source Code

You can get its source at Github: https://github.com/felladrin/alienation-unity3d-game
